trans-unit.source: Controls run-time behavior of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> associated with an operation.
trans-unit.target: 控制與作業相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> 執行階段行為。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerOperationBehavior> enables control of <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> options, such as the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerOperationBehavior> 會啟用 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> 選項的控制權，例如 <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Style%2A> 的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example finds the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerOperationBehavior> for a specific operation, and sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute> for the serializer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會針對特定作業尋找 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerOperationBehavior>，並針對序列化程式設定 <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Style%2A> 的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerOperationBehavior" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerOperationBehavior" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> to export or serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要匯出或序列化的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerOperationBehavior" /> class with a specific operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用特定的作業，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerOperationBehavior" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> to export or serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要匯出或序列化的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerOperationBehavior" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerOperationBehavior" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of mappings between XML schema elements and CLR data types.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XML 結構描述項目和 CLR 資料型別之間的對應集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping" />s that contains the mappings.
trans-unit.target: 包含對應之 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping" />。

trans-unit.source: The target <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: 目標 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection" /> that contains the parameters.
trans-unit.target: 包含參數的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a set of parameters to an operation description.
trans-unit.target: 將一組參數加入至作業描述。

trans-unit.source: Adds a set of parameters to an operation description.
trans-unit.target: 將一組參數加入至作業描述。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> that represents the operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示作業的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation" /> that represents a client operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示用戶端作業的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation" />。

trans-unit.source: Applies a client's behavior to the operation.
trans-unit.target: 將用戶端的行為套用到作業。

trans-unit.source: Applies a client's behavior to the operation.
trans-unit.target: 將用戶端的行為套用到作業。

trans-unit.source: The target <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: 目標 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation" /> to apply.
trans-unit.target: 要套用的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation" />。

trans-unit.source: Applies a dispatch behavior to the operation.
trans-unit.target: 將分派行為套用到作業。

trans-unit.source: Applies a dispatch behavior to the operation.
trans-unit.target: 將分派行為套用到作業。

trans-unit.source: The target <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" /> to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的目標 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription" />。

trans-unit.source: Validates the operation.
trans-unit.target: 驗證作業。

trans-unit.source: Validates the operation.
trans-unit.target: 驗證作業。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" /> to use for the export.
trans-unit.target: 要用於匯出的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext" /> to export.
trans-unit.target: 要匯出的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Exports the operation data as a WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: 將作業資料匯出為 WSDL 文件。

trans-unit.source: Exports the operation data as a WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: 將作業資料匯出為 WSDL 文件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" /> to use for the export.
trans-unit.target: 要用於匯出的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext" /> to export.
trans-unit.target: 要匯出的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Exports the endpoint data as a WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: 將端點資料匯出為 WSDL 文件。

trans-unit.source: Exports the endpoint data as a WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: 將端點資料匯出為 WSDL 文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that holds SOAP use and format options.
trans-unit.target: 取得會保留 SOAP use 和格式選項的物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute" /> that holds SOAP use and format options.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute" />，會保留 SOAP use 和格式選項。
